Name: :math:`c_\text{DA}^{t}`
Description: Day-ahead energy market price

Name: :math:`nb_\text{SEC}`
Description: Number of seconds in one hour

Name: :math:`nb_\text{HOUR}`
Description: Number of hours for each time-step

Name: :math:`c_\text{UN}^{+}`
Description: Penality price applied to positive difference volume

Name: :math:`c_\text{UN}^{-}`
Description: Penality price applied to negative difference volume

Name: :math:`\alpha^{+}`
Description: Power factor applied to positive difference volume

Name: :math:`\alpha^{-}`
Description: Power factor applied to negative difference volume

Name: :math:`V_\text{POW}^{h}`
Description: Powered water volume sepoints for each hydropower plant

Name: :math:`dV_\text{LAST}^{h}`
Description: Remaining volume unpowered from last simulation

Name: :math:`V_\text{BUF}^{h}`
Description: Max volume buffer between power volume setpoint and calculated

Name: :math:`F_\text{SPIL}^{b}`
Description: Penality factor for water volume splilled : :math:`F_\text{SPIL}^{b}  = \begin{cases} 1e^2 \text{ if  hydo power plant upstream basin} \\ 1e^{-2} \text{ otherwise} \end{cases}`

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, START}^{b}`
Description: Basins stating water volume

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, MAX}^{b,~s_b}`
Description: Basins water volume upper boundary for each state

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, MIN}^{b,~s_b}`
Description: Basins water volume lower boundary for each state

Name: :math:`V_\text{BAS, DIS}^{t,~b}`
Description: Water volume entering a basin due to runoff and snowmelt

Name: :math:`F_\text{TUR}^{b,~h}`
Description: Factor to specify whether the turbined water of a plant is added into a basin or removed

Name: :math:`Q_\text{MIN}^{h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Min water flows that can be turbined (or pumed) for each state

Name: :math:`Q_\text{MAX}^{h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Max water flows that can be  turbined (or pumed)  for each state

Name: :math:`dQ^{h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Water flow ramps derived from basin volumes for each state.

Name: :math:`P_\text{MIN}^{h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Min power that can produced (or consumed) for each state

Name: :math:`dP^{h,~s_h,~s_q}`
Description: Power ramps derived from basin volumes for each state.
